div.p: We have developed a webpage specifically for our VUSD Families during our school closures.Â Please visit:

Employees, thank you!Â We appreciate all you have done and continue to do to keep our students safe and healthy. We have developed a webpage specifically for you. Please refer to this website frequently and often.Â Our VUSD Employee Connections Newsletter will be suspended until the school sites open as we want to be sure you are receiving the most up-to-date inforamtion. With that said, we ask that you are checking your VUSD email frequently as well as this website and contact your supervisor if you have any questions.Â Again THANK YOU!

p.a: Employee Coronavirus/COVID-19 School Closure Information Webpage

p.img: Thank you to all of our amazing community members who have requested to volunteer at our sites for meal and device distribution. Your support for our students is overwhelming and we are eternally grateful.

div.p: Some of you have offered food donations; unfortunately, we are unable to accept these but there are community organizations that will greatly appreciate this support.

If you would like to volunteer or offer a donation please email us at volunteer@venturausd.org. At this time, we are working to enter everyone in our database and will schedule you as soon as we are able. We appreciate all of you for your patience and kindness; you are what makes Ventura a very special place. Â Stay well.Â

h2.span: Updating Parent/Guardian Information In Q Parent Connection

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

p.span: The District is updating parent information in Q Parent Connection in advance of an upgrade to its mass notification system.Â

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

p.span: We are encouraging all parents/guardians to do the following:

span.style: font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;
span.b: Log into Q before Friday, March 6, 2020 and do the following:

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.span: Click on My Information in the upper right-hand corner

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.span: Click on the plus sign next to each contact. Please review the information for each person

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;
font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.span: Ensure that the correct type of phone is selected (cellular vs. work vs. residence) and make sure that the box for Text Msg is clicked if you can accept text messages to that phone.

span.style: font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.span: If you need to change anything, click edit.

li.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

li.span: If you change anything, click the submit button and it will then update the system.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; border-width: 1pt; border-style: none; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in;

p.span: If you do not have a Q pin and password, please reach out to your schoolâ€™s front office for assistance. If you are having issues with a Q pin and password that had already been set up, please contact Technology Services at 805-641-5000 x1340.

strong.p: Agendas for Ventura Unified School District meetings of the Board of Education may be found on the Board of Education pages.Â Additionally, agendas for upcoming regualr board meeting may be accessed directly by clicking hereÂ - special board meeting may be accessed here once the agenda has been published. Agendas for the Personnel Commission meetings may be found on the Personnel Commission page. Additionally, agendas for upcoming Personnel Commission meetings may be accessed directly by clicking here once the agenda has been published.

div.p: Title 5 Information and contacts for Title II, IX, 504 and CCR Title 5 may be found here.Â

As you consider the nature of your complaint, we always recommend you seek resolution at the lowest possible level before proceeding through the formal complaint procedures. That said, we understand there are times when the situation may warrant the use of an appropriate complaint forms and documents. To assist you, we have provided the forms here. â€‹Â

div.class: fadeInLeftOnView eds_hidden eds_visible animated fadeInLeft full-visible

p.span: When delivering an education that prepares students for a future in the world today, a one-size-fits-all approach no longer suffices.Â

Hoy en dÃ­a, cuando se trata de brindar una educaciÃ³n que prepare a los estudiantes para un futuro en el mundo actual, ya no es suficiente enfocarse en un mismo tipo de preparaciÃ³n para todos los estudiantes.

div.class: fadeInOnView eds_hidden eds_visible animated fadeIn full-visible

p.span: Once you've discovered the academic path that's right for your student, it's time to enroll. Let us help you with this process.
Una vez que haya descubierto el camino acadÃ©mico adecuado para su estudiante, es hora de inscribirse.Â PermÃ­tanos ayudarle con este proceso.

div.class: fadeInRightOnView eds_hidden eds_visible animated fadeInRight full-visible

p.span: A career in education may be in your future! Find out which jobs are available now, and explore the possibilities for tomorrow.
Our Human Resources department is always seeking folks who are committed to the future of every student for our many programs and services. See if an opening is right for you!

div.span: The Governing Board is committed to equal opportunity for all individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from discrimination based on race, color, ancestry, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, or genetic information; the perception of one or more of such characteristics; or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. The Board shall promote programs which ensure that discriminatory practices are eliminated in all district activities. (BP 0410)
